code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Course=function Course(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:props.course})});};var Part=function Part(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[props.part," ",props.exercise]})});};var Content=function Content(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Part,{part:props.part1,exercise:props.exercises1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Part,{part:props.part2,exercise:props.exercises2}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Part,{part:props.part3,exercise:props.exercises3})]});};var Total=function Total(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Number of exercises ",props.total]})});};var App=function App(){var course='Half Stack application development';var part1='Fundamentals of React';var exercises1=10;var part2='Using props to pass data';var exercises2=7;var part3='State of a component';var exercises3=14;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Course,{course:course}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Content,{part1:part1,exercises1:exercises1,part2:part2,exercises2:exercises2,part3:part3,exercises3:exercises3}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Total,{total:exercises1+exercises2+exercises3})]});};export default App;
